comments:
Using: Integration Build 200309090800

:)  I was looking through the new "How to keep Up-To-Date" article 
(http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-Update/keeping-up-to-date.html) and 
followed it through.

One problem I noticed was in site.xml -> Build -> Build Control.
Both "Browse" buttons have no effect (i.e. no dialogs come up, etc.)

Another was that since the browse buttons didn't work, I attempted to manually 
change the feature & plug-in destinations.  Upon saving, I got a 
ClassCastException error.  

Stack Trace:

Cherie, the article is for 2.1 and I think you used 3.0 (at least that's what 
the bug is opened against).
Moving to PDE.

The class cast exception is now fixed.
If any other steps in the scenario fail, please open a bug report per problem, 
indicating the step that failed.
